Name: Samsung Galaxy S21
Details: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a flagship smartphone with a stunning display, powerful performance, and a high-quality camera system.

Name: Samsung Galaxy Book Pro
Details: The Samsung Galaxy Book Pro is a sleek and powerful laptop with a bright AMOLED display and excellent performance.

Name: Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro
Details: The Samsung Galaxy Buds Pro are wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and a comfortable fit for long listening sessions.

Name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
Details: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 is a versatile Android tablet with a high-resolution display and S Pen support for productivity.
